entries.abort: You're aborting?! Alright, I'm out of here!
entries.arrived_at_loc: This is the correct coordinates, the hacker should be there any moment.
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < Incoming fighter vessels. Scans show weapons armed. >
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.complete: Great work pilot, we got what we wanted and you saved the hacker. Return to base.
entries.failed_destroy: We have lost contact with the hacker! Get out of there pilot!
entries.failed_protect: That's it, I can't take on these TIE's on my own, performing hyperspace jump.
entries.found_loc: Rebel Command: < Proceed as planned to the rendez-vous coordinates. >
entries.goodbye_1: This is the last time I'm doing the Alliance a service. Your data is readable, I'm out of here!
entries.goodbye_2: This is the last time I'm doing the Alliance a service. Your data is readable, I'm out of here!
entries.goodbye_3: This is the last time I'm doing the Alliance a service. Your data is readable, I'm out of here!
entries.goodbye_4: This is the last time I'm doing the Alliance a service. Your data is readable, I'm out of here!
entries.goodbye_5: This is the last time I'm doing the Alliance a service. Your data is readable, I'm out of here!
entries.hull_half: My ship is falling apart, get them off me now!
entries.panic_1: Crap! I knew working for the Alliance was a bad idea.
entries.panic_3: What are these TIE's doing here?! Someone must have set us up!
entries.panic_4: TIE Fighters! And they are not being friendly either!
entries.panic_5: I knew it.. TIE Fighters incoming, weapons blasting!
entries.quest_escort_d: The hacker wants to keep moving while slicing the Imperial data. Escort him and stay sharp!
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Dantooine system where the hacker will meet up with you.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Quickly travel to these coordinates to meet up with the hacker.
entries.reason_1: Keep moving, transfer the data and I will fix it. Stay sharp, this area has had a lot of strange activity lately.
entries.reason_2: Keep moving, transfer the data and I will fix it. Stay sharp, this area has had a lot of strange activity lately.
entries.reason_3: Keep moving, transfer the data and I will fix it. Stay sharp, this area has had a lot of strange activity lately.
entries.reason_4: Keep moving, transfer the data and I will fix it. Stay sharp, this area has had a lot of strange activity lately.
entries.reason_5: Keep moving, transfer the data and I will fix it. Stay sharp, this area has had a lot of strange activity lately.
entries.shields_depleted: Shields fried! I can't encrypt this and fight these TIE's at the same time, get them off me!
entries.taunt_1: You are in violation of Imperial Law, code 401-1D0. Surrender immediately.
entries.taunt_2: Scans show contraband onboard your vessels. Turn off your engines and surrender!
entries.taunt_3: Rebel scum, you messed up this time!
entries.thanks_1: Not bad, I'm almost done here.
entries.thanks_2: At least you sent a competent pilot. Still have some work left on this data.
entries.thanks_3: Clear, for now. I'm almost done here.
entries.thanks_4: Phew, thought this would be my last job. I'm still working on this data.
entries.thanks_5: Great, I'm almost finished here too. Stay sharp.
entries.title: Dantooine system: Meet with hacker to slice the Imperial data.
entries.title_d: Your orders are to meet up with a hacker that supposedly can crack the encrypted Imperial data.
